modName: Hairs of Serana and Valerica Made Playable
summary: A mod that makes the hairs of Serana and Valerica usable.
descriptionHtml:
100 ENDORSEMENTS! THANKS EVERYONE!

This is a simple mod that allows you to use the hairstyles of Serana and her mother, Valerica. This mod is compatible with any hair texture replacer, e.g AOF Believable Hair, so it will look different on each system.

This mod requires the Dawnguard DLC, or else you will get a CTD when launching Skyrim.
If you find bugs, please report them in the comments, as I will check them every day and I'll try to provide as much support as I can.

Thank you for downloading, enjoy, and be sure to endorse this mod if you like it!

Cheers,
pwner69.
author: Me and Bethesda
